New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2025 年 1 月 23 日星期四 08:18:44 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Police chase man on ride-on mower after burglary in Karaka, South Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-chase-man-on-ride-on-mower-after-burglary-in-karaka-south-auckland/GLAFGK2NYVHUBOGZ7QZUMDLAGA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-chase-man-on-ride-on-mower-after-burglary-in-karaka-south-auckland/GLAFGK2NYVHUBOGZ7QZUMDLAGA/ Three officers were seen running after a man on the ride-on lawnmower. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 07:27:43 +0000 Police officers chase after the ride-on lawn mower in Karaka.
Whooping cough epidemic: 13 whooping cough cases in Tairāwhiti since November https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/whooping-cough-epidemic-13-whooping-cough-cases-in-tairawiti-since-november/QGFSRNWJL5BB5HA5WK4ZTZ6QUU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/whooping-cough-epidemic-13-whooping-cough-cases-in-tairawiti-since-november/QGFSRNWJL5BB5HA5WK4ZTZ6QUU/ Wynsley WrigleyOne baby has been hospitalised due to whooping cough in Tairāwhiti since November. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 07:00:00 +0000 Immunisation is the best protection against whooping cough. New Zealand is currently caught in a whooping cough epidemic.
Watercare shuts off water to West Auckland suburbs after pipe bursts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watercare-shuts-off-water-to-west-auckland-suburbs-after-pipe-bursts/FRSM56SNZVHO7LT532636O46O4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/watercare-shuts-off-water-to-west-auckland-suburbs-after-pipe-bursts/FRSM56SNZVHO7LT532636O46O4/ Due to the pipe's size it could take 24 hours to restore water to large parts of the West. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 06:42:46 +0000 A break in a large-diameter watermain on Mountain Rd in Henderson Valley has caused a water outage to parts of west Auckland. Image - Watercare
Nelson woman Megan Aitken sentenced for threatening psychologist with ‘fearful texts’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/nelson-woman-megan-aitken-sentenced-for-威胁-心理学家-with-fearful-texts/TQKVPUO26BFYBLOTJBUJXICNVU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/nelson-woman-megan-aitken-sentenced-for-威胁-心理学家-with-fearful-texts/TQKVPUO26BFYBLOTJBUJXICNVU/ Tracy NealShe told him she hoped he would get cancer and that his house burned down. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 06:00:00 +0000 A woman sent a psychologist a barrage of abusive text messages after he declined to refer her to ACC for the concussion she claimed to have. Photo / 123RF
Auckland Anniversary weekend weather: Showers, cloud for North Island, but sun by Monday https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-weekend-weather-showers-cloud-for-north-island-but-sun-by-monday/CFJZKF5NF5EPVPOSZASHPSGQB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-anniversary-weekend-weather-showers-cloud-for-north-island-but-sun-by-monday/CFJZKF5NF5EPVPOSZASHPSGQB4/ Raphael FranksWarm, muggy temperatures cloak the North Island with only one cloudless day. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 06:00:00 +0000 MetService has forecast showers for Saturday and Sunday across most of the North Island, followed by a finer day on Monday. Photo / Alex Burton
Why Western Bay council chief executive John Holyoake resigned https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/why-western-bay-council-chief-executive-john-holyoake-resigned/TJBFBCZOQVGPVMFFXLX2AW7W2U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/why-western-bay-council-chief-executive-john-holyoake-resigned/TJBFBCZOQVGPVMFFXLX2AW7W2U/ Alisha EvansHe says being in chief executive roles for 10 years “takes its toll”. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 05:00:00 +0000 Western Bay of Plenty District Council chief executive John Holyoake will finish at the council on April 20. Photo / NZME
Dates scheduled for coroner’s hearings into Auckland flood and Cyclone Gabrielle deaths https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dates-scheduled-for-coroners-hearings-into-auckland-flood-and-cyclone-gabrielle-deaths/USD3NJEBLRCDVCCLGJ4MROJANQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dates-scheduled-for-coroners-hearings-into-auckland-flood-and-cyclone-gabrielle-deaths/USD3NJEBLRCDVCCLGJ4MROJANQ/ Ric StevensThe inquiry is likely to examine warnings, weather forecasts, landslide and flood risks. Search under way for missing swimmer at beach at Southshore, Christchurch https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-search-for-missing-swimmer-at-beach-at-southshore-christchurch/WL7FGNSMO5HORPGDE6U2PCQD4A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-search-for-missing-swimmer-at-beach-at-southshore-christchurch/WL7FGNSMO5HORPGDE6U2PCQD4A/ Several people on the beach were spotted with binoculars. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 04:45:22 +0000 Police and Coastguard NZ are searching for a swimmer who went missing off Southshore beach in Christchurch’s east.

Tairāwhiti news digest: Gisborne medical lab staff to strike, seeking East Coast youth MP, cruise visit https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tairawiti-news-digest-gisborne-medical-lab-staff-to-strike-seeking-east-coast-youth-mp-cruise-visit/ 2JLAVJSZ7FCYHORUGDQX4772SM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/tairawiti-news-digest-gisborne-medical-lab-staff-to-strike-seeking-east-coast-youth-mp-cruise-visit/ 2JLAVJSZ7FCYHORUGDQX4772SM/ Wynsley WrigleyLab workers earn 28% to 32% less than their Te Whatu Ora counterparts. Thu, 23 Jan 2025 04:00:00 +0000 Staff at Gisborne's TLab and other sites around the country will strike on February 6 and 7 after pay equity talks with Medlab Central/Tlab failed. Photo / Wynsley Wrigley
